ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:784)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1071 Drug Susceptibility Test Result Name DYNAMIC (CONF:786)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 HL7ActStatus)
